title: ELPA Rally
text:
The ELPA Rally was a <a href="rallying">rally</a> competition held in the <a href="Chalkidiki">Chalkidiki</a> <a href="peninsula">peninsula</a> in <a href="Greece">Greece</a>. The rally was organised by the <a href="Automobile%20and%20Touring%20Club%20of%20Greece">Automobile and Touring Club of Greece</a> (ELPA) and was the second most important rally event in Greece after the <a href="Acropolis%20Rally">Acropolis Rally</a>. The first edition was held in 1976 under the name Chalkidiki Rally. Since 1977 the rally was regular part of the <a href="European%20Rally%20Championship">European Rally Championship</a>. The 2011 edition of the rally was cancelled due to financial reasons and was never revived since.
Previous winners.
